title: Does the NFL have a Tom Brady dilemma?
summary: Tom Brady may no longer shred NFL defenses every Sunday, be he is still a story.

title: Norris hits back with Piastri adrift as rivals challenge McLaren ahead of qualifying
summary: Lando Norris hit back impressively from hitting the wall on Friday to top the final practice session ahead of qualifying for the Azerbaijan Grand Prix with McLaren team-mate and title leader Oscar Piastri behind Max Verstappen in third.

title: Eubank Jr open to fights with Crawford, Canelo and even Golovkin
summary: Chris Eubank Jr would welcome a future super-fight with new undisputed star Terence Crawford, Canelo Alvarez or even a returning Gennadiy Golovkin.

title: Today on Sky Sports Racing: Into The Sky set to sparkle in Mill Reef?
summary: The Group Two Mill Reef Stakes is the main attraction on a classy card at Newbury this Saturday, while two trainers battle it out for a £10,000 prize in a thrilling title battle at Chester's season finale.

title: Papers: Benitez wants return to England as West Ham fans plot board protests
summary: The top stories and transfer rumours from Saturday's newspapers...
